body.name: Neck Pillow Cervical Memory Foam Pillows for Pain Relief Sleeping, Contour Pillow for Shoulder Pain, Ergonomic Orthopedic Bed Pillow for Side, Back & Stomach Sleepers with Breathable Pillowcase
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 4 hrs 40 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Patented Ergonomic Design Cervical Pillow】The neck pillow adopts a unique butterfly shape design, which combined with the traditional bed pillow, thus achieving significant neck pain relief.Butterfly shape gives your arms special armrests. Contour design holds your neck at the right height and offers excellent support during sleep.The central cavity properly supports the head,facilitates alignment of the head with the body and spine.Choose Bespillow contour pillow and experience a sound sleep!

【Embrace Healthy Sleep with Premium Memory Foam】Our Cervical pillow is made of high-quality CertiPUR-US and Oeko-Tex certified rebound memory foam, and a unique nature molded foam design. When you lie on your back or side, the high-quality texture is soft but supportive, and after long-term use, the neck pillow will not become flat, lose its shape or density. Special slow rebound memory foam won't change its shape and firmness due to season. Unleash your best sleep with our ergonomic pillow- the ultimate blend of comfort, style, and quality!

【2 Personalized Height in A pillow for Any Sleep Style】Do you often toss and turn because you can't find the height that suits you? Bespillow cervical pillow helps you to fix this trouble. Our memory foam pillows comes two height options with size 24.8*14.5*5.1/4.5 inch ( L x W x H).The ergonomic and supportive pillow for neck pain is designed for multiple sleeping positions, such as side sleeping, supine, stomach sleeping, back sleeping and low pillow sleepers etc.

【Breathable and Removable Pillowcase】The sleeping pillow features a high-quality double-layer pillowcase that is soft and fits snugly with the pillow core, with 3 times the breathability of other contour pillow. It is removable with a zipper, machine-washable. The pillowcase is made of COLD SILK TECHNOLOGY FABRIC, perfectly fitting the skin, with soft and cooling fabric that keep you cool all night long-allowing the skin to breathe and have a dry night! Give you the comfortable sleep you want!

【Want a no-worry purchase experience? 】 Bespillow is a brand of devoted pillow for neck and shoulder pain. We strive for the quality of our products. This cervical pillow is also a great gift for yourself, your parents, friends & colleagues. Note: The memory foam will have a very slight smell of polyurethane.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pillow - So far so good for my neck pain.
reviews.reviewText: Just revieved this 4 days ago and started using the right away. I am a back sleeper and have used Tempurperic and various memory foam, MyPillow, Serta, you name it. It is the perfect height as most are too high. The pillow allows your head to nest perfectly and allows your arm to go up through the groove which offers perfect comfort for those who sleep with arms up under pillow. I wakeup without shoulder pain. Some complain it takes time to get used to this new pillow but the first night I had great interrupted sleep. Highly recommend for back sleepers and it works perfectly with my CPAP.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works when 20 other pillows did not
reviews.reviewText: After a lifetime of bad sleep from pillows that were too soft, too hard, too hot, too crunchy, too feathery, too everything -- this pillow has afforded me the best night's sleep I have had in many years. Give it a try -- you can return if it does not work for you. But it is so comfortable and helps my neck/spine alignment. I am no longer waking up all night long, flipping the pillow over or grabbing another of the 6 that are on my bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is so comfy! I get hot at night, and the cooling effect is nice. I told my best friend to get one, because she has severe back pain. She said it's exactly what she needed because it gives her the neck support she needs. I really love this pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The comfort, support and contour of the pillow have helped me to rest better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is an initial review; the pillow is nice and firm, so it seems to support my neck. I have only been using it a few nights, so time will tell, but so far I am enjoying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skeptical???? JUST TRY IT!!
reviews.reviewText: Alright.... it's another pillow!!! How different could it be??? Among the many basic, department store pillows I've bought , this is probably the 4th or 5th "It will change your life pillow I've bought "! I'm not going to lie. I bought this pillow with the anticipation that I would probably be returning. Well.... here I am, 4 weeks later and, well..... I'm COMPLETELY HOOKED!!! This pillow cradles my head and neck. It feels like you have complete support, in all the right places! I tend to be a side sleeper , but I frequently try to sleep on my back for esthetic reasons. I am usually unable to get comfortable on my back. Now, I'll honestly say, I can actually get comfortable on my back. I will say, this is absolutely the most comfortable "side sleeping pillow". It is so comfortable lying on your side. It cradles your face and neck to perfection.! Let's also note the outer, removable, washable cover. It's a cooling material! Soft and says cool! I don't wake up sweating! I have to say, I really look forward on sleeping on the pillow each night, and absolutely recommend you try it!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Heavenly Oasis for Restful Nights
reviews.reviewText: Rating: (5/5)After enduring countless restless nights and waking up with persistent neck pain, I decided it was time to invest in a solution that promised both comfort and relief. Enter the Neck Pillow Cervical Memory Foam Pillow – a game-changer in the world of sleep accessories.From the moment I laid eyes on this ergonomic wonder, I could sense that my nights were about to be transformed. The sleek design and premium quality of the pillow are evident upon first touch. The hypoallergenic, breathable cover adds an extra layer of luxury, making it a visually appealing addition to any bed.What sets this cervical pillow apart is its ingeniously crafted memory foam. As someone prone to neck pain, the contouring support provided by this pillow is nothing short of miraculous. The memory foam adapts seamlessly to the shape of my neck, providing optimal alignment and support throughout the night. It's like having a personal sleep concierge ensuring that every angle is just right.The Neck Pillow Cervical Memory Foam Pillow has proven to be an investment in my well-being. It transcends the realm of mere sleep accessories and has become an indispensable part of my nightly ritual. It's not just a pillow; it's a therapeutic haven that promises and delivers on the dream of pain-free, restorative sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good support and felt better after first night of use.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pillow to provide better support for my neck and to relieve the stiffness I had felt. Indeed, it has made a difference. I thought the price paid was quite reasonable so the whole experience has been a good one. Would recommend for others to try.

This pillow has been a god send! I never felt any pillow fully supported my head from falling forward. Since using this pillow my neck it supported and I am waking up with no more neck pain. I love love love it. I hope it works for everyone else like it has for me :)
